arduinoLight.arduino

Class SerialConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • arduinoLight.arduino.SerialConnection

  • public class SerialConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates a serial connection. It provides a simple interface (open, close, transmit).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SerialConnection() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the connection.

      Gives an Enumeration of CommPortIdentifiers from which one can be used as a parameter in the 'connect'-method.

      Tries to establish a serialconnection with the given portId and baudRate and set the _serialOutputStream.

      If the connection is open, the given bytes are transmitted.

      • SerialConnection

        public SerialConnection()

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailablePorts

        public static java.util.Enumeration<gnu.io.CommPortIdentifier> getAvailablePorts()
        Gives an Enumeration of CommPortIdentifiers from which one can be used as a parameter in the 'connect'-method.

      • open

        public void open(gnu.io.CommPortIdentifier portId,
        int baudRate)
          throws gnu.io.PortInUseException
        Tries to establish a serialconnection with the given portId and baudRate and set the _serialOutputStream. If the connection could be established, _active is set to true.
        Parameters:
        portId - a CommPortIdentifier-object, used for identifying and connecting to a port.
        baudRate - This has to match the settings in the arduino-code. Recommended value: 256000.
        Throws:
        PortInUseException, - IllegalArgumentException
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there is already a connection active
        gnu.io.PortInUseException

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the connection.

      • transmit

        public void transmit(byte[] bytes)
        If the connection is open, the given bytes are transmitted. If the connection is closed, IllegalStateException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        bytes - the bytes to transmit.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if transmission failed, or the connection is closed.

      • getPortName

        public java.lang.String getPortName()

        public int getBaudRate()

        public boolean isOpen()
